name: You Have A Treasure
description:
Hey I Am David Sumit this is my Second Game  in this game you have a green man and he have a treasure but he can't carry it .because he need Magic Box  for carry The  treasure .his goal is find the magic box  and defeat the   small enemies and  Last level Defeat    the Boss Enemy.

                                          Move with WASD

                                               Fire  With  Left Mouse Button

❤❤❤❤❤❤✔👍👍👍👍👍😃😃😃😃😃

.
